languages.text: {n}Глейто долго смотрит на вас, затем гавкает и обводит взглядом конюшню — он явно ждет указаний.{/n}
{n}Glaito stares at you for a while, then barks and turns to scan the area. He is clearly waiting for orders.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Глейто долго смотрит на вас, затем гавкает и обводит взглядом конюшню — он явно ждет указаний.{/n}

languages.text: {n}格雷托盯着你看了一会儿，之后吠叫起来，转身扫视着这片区域。很显然，它在等待着命令。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito stares at you for a while, then barks and turns to scan the area. He is clearly waiting for orders.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}格雷托盯着你看了一会儿，之后吠叫起来，转身扫视着这片区域。很显然，它在等待着命令。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Glaito te mira durante un rato, luego ladra y se gira para analizar la zona. Claramente, espera órdenes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito stares at you for a while, then barks and turns to scan the area. He is clearly waiting for orders.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito te mira durante un rato, luego ladra y se gira para analizar la zona. Claramente, espera órdenes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Glaito bir süre sana bakıp sonra havlıyor ve bölgeyi taramak üzere geri dönüyor. Senden emir bekliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito stares at you for a while, then barks and turns to scan the area. He is clearly waiting for orders.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito bir süre sana bakıp sonra havlıyor ve bölgeyi taramak üzere geri dönüyor. Senden emir bekliyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}グライトはしばらくあなたをじっと見つめた後、吠えてからあたりを見渡す。彼は明らかに命令を待っている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito stares at you for a while, then barks and turns to scan the area. He is clearly waiting for orders.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}グライトはしばらくあなたをじっと見つめた後、吠えてからあたりを見渡す。彼は明らかに命令を待っている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Glaito vous observe un instant, puis aboie et se tourne pour analyser les environs. Il attend clairement des ordres.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito stares at you for a while, then barks and turns to scan the area. He is clearly waiting for orders.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito vous observe un instant, puis aboie et se tourne pour analyser les environs. Il attend clairement des ordres.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Glaito starrt dich eine Weile an, ehe er bellt und die Umgebung scannt. Er wartet offensichtlich auf Befehle.{/n}
